product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThey're Real! Tinted Lash Primer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingBenefit Cosmetics They're Real! Tinted Primer defines AND primes lashes. Wear it alone or with your favorite mascara! When worn alone, the mink-brown primer gives lashes a natural, feathery look.
details: DetailsBenefitsMink-brown tinted primer can be worn alone or under your favorite mascaraHigh performing gel formula conditions lashes with Provitamin B5 leaves lashes soft enough to layer mascara up to 6 hours later*Custom ExtraFlex brush is specially designed to move with lashes for beyond belief separation*Consumer panel survey on 65 women over 1 weekFeatures89% said lashes had a natural look*91% said it was soft enough to layer on mascara 6 hours later**Consumer panel survey on 65 women over 1 weekItem 2295079How To UseWiggle the wand at base of lashes then sweep upward from root to tip. Wear alone or layer your favorite mascara on top.Beauty tip: Wear under They're Real! Lengthening Mascara for dramatically boosted lash length & separation or under Roller Lash Super-Curling & Lifting Mascara for dramatic curl.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Polybutene, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride,Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, PVP, Steareth-21, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, VP/EicoseneCopolymer, Nylon-12, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, AminomethylPropanediol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Algin, Acacia Senegal Gum, Serine. May Contain: CI 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77163 (BismuthOxychloride), CI 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), CI 77289 (Chromium Hydroxide Green), CI 77491, CI77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 77742(Manganese Violet), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit Product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wiggle the wand at base of lashes then sweep upward from root to tip. Wear alone or layer your favorite mascara on top.Beauty tip: Wear under They're Real! Lengthening Mascara for dramatically boosted lash length & separation or under Roller Lash Super-Curling & Lifting Mascara for dramatic curl.
ingredients: please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again
reviews.comments: Yes, this is technically a brown tinted lash primer, but since I am a senior and my lashes are no longer thick, this is working perfectly for me as my mascara. It was easy to remove at the end of the day, stayed put and didn't flake off, and didn't have a sticky "heavy" feel to it. It did absolutely everything I hoped for (defined my lashes and was easy to apply), and I experienced no negatives. PERFECT!

reviews.headline: I can't  use it,
reviews.comments: After a few minutes  of wearing this my eyes burn and water so bad I can't  see.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this Tinted Primer
reviews.comments: I have used other primer ... that were white. They never worked for me and I tried more than one brand. The Benefit's tinted primer is brown which makes a perfect based for any mascara. Or, you can use this  on its own. I've used it for years and will continue to as long as it's available.

reviews.headline: GREAT
reviews.comments: I have been using this for a few years.  I have short light eyelashes & this definitely creates volume & length.

reviews.headline: Not Incentivized !  Love this stuff
reviews.comments: I have been using this for several years since my daughter introduced me to it . I don't care for the white primers .I don't have very thick or long eyelashes so i love the fact that its tinted !  I use the bad gal mascara over it . No flaking ever which i have had with other mascaras .

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments:
I HATE WHITE PRIMERS, which is why this is sooo great! blends so well or can be used on its own. my lashes feel great and my mascara, of any brand, goes on so nicely. 
I will revolt if they discontinue this product! every time I find a product I like they discontinue it.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I'm on my fourth or fifth bottle of this. Love the way it coats lashes before you put on mascara. Will continue to buy!

reviews.headline: Those with short, light lashes should buy!:DD
reviews.comments: I have Asian monolids accompanied by short lashes, and my mascara routine in the past always made my lashes dry, clumpy, and jagged. I had hoped that this primer would just separate my lashes and keep them smooth for applying regular mascara, but I was completely shocked when it lengthened my lashes greatlyâ€” plus the tint was much more prominent than I expected! My lashes have never looked longer, especially when you top it with a lengthening-based mascara! This primer could go perfectly by itself for natural, lengthened, and darkened lashes!

reviews.headline: it's ok
reviews.comments: Not as please as I would have hoped. Won't buy again.

reviews.headline: The undercover hero of my lash routine
reviews.comments: This tinted primer is the undercover hero of my lash routine. It is smooth, light, and goes on without clumping. The tint is lovely enough to be worn alone. For climate comparison - we live in a dry climate.

reviews.headline: Amazazing product
reviews.comments: I am a redhead and my eyelashes and brows are invisible ðŸ«¥ I got the brown and absolutely love it! It's a nice soft color but is also buildable to wear alone or with a mascara.  I.prefer it alone!

reviews.headline: Best lash primer ever
reviews.comments: I even use this tinted primer alone, as well as, a base. I just wish that it was still offered in a travel size. I change my primer and mascara often and full sizes are a waste.

reviews.headline: Just okay!
reviews.comments: I wasn't impressed with the results.  It's kinda plain and boring on my eyes.  Was hoping for more after reading comments.  If you want volume or thickness I don't feel this will give that to you.  Back to the drawing board.  I may return if I find time.

reviews.headline: Great mascara but there was some false advertisement on it
reviews.comments: It said I would get a free gift and never did.

reviews.headline: I use this regularly and don't need mascara
reviews.comments: This is the best tinted primer.  Use it often without any mascara.

reviews.headline: Best
reviews.comments: I use this as a mascara with a white primer underneath.  It goes on easy, no clumping or fall out and removes easy as well.

reviews.headline: Favorite lash primer
reviews.comments: By far the best lash primer. I use it with Badgal Bang mascara and I love it! I have tried other brands, but this is my favorite.

reviews.headline: not my preference
reviews.comments: I like the brown color, the wand isn't stiff enough. the texture was great, it went on a tad light and didn't seem to add much volume. I prefer my Urban Decay Perversion Primer (white in color).

reviews.headline: I lobe this product! I wear alone many days
reviews.comments: Doesn't flake or clump and gives great definition.  Good alone, but great under mascara!

reviews.headline: THE ONE & ONLY
reviews.comments: This mascara is PEFECT for those with lighter hair, eyes and/or complexions who want to enhance their features. It does not clump or flake. It separates the lashes nicely. It looks amazing on bottom lashes. You can layer it to achieve a dark look. You can keep it light for a no makeup look. This is the only mascara I can use anymore as everything else disappoints. Whether you're going to your day job or a night club, this is THE mascara.

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this! I've waited for this product to be available in stores and it was definitely worth the wait! Looks so natural and doesn't clump at all. In fact, I felt that it prevented clumps when using the they're real mascara on top of it.
faceoff_positive.headline: I love they're real mascara and I love this primer!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I purchased this product in store the day it came out and and have used it four times since. I do not feel like this tinted lash primer does anything extraordinary. It does tint my lashes - but the look it gives is so natural you can't even tell there is something on my lashes. It does not grab every lash - as I do have some very short lashes that were missed. It also seems to be a little more watery of a formula and I find that it smudges along the top lash line pretty easily. 

I also don't think that it does a good job layering with a mascara. I found that it made my lashes a little more clumpy than if I had just done my routine of layering two different mascaras. I have tried three different mascaras on top of the lash primer - They're Real, HUGE, and Lights, Camera, Lashes. All of them clumped more than normal and didn't say feathery and separated through the day. 

The brush on this product is also very wiggly. Some would say that it gives you more control and precision - but I disagree. I think that it makes it harder for a perfect application and for not getting smudges on your lash line. 

Overall - I think that there are other primers out there, that are white, that do a better job than this one. If you are looking to wear it alone - then go for it, but in terms of a true primer - I would pass.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not Worth the Hype
